sport author field mile high, bronco play home game sinc 2001 list season complet denver broncos, american footbal franchis base denver, colorado. bronco member west divis american footbal confer (afc) nation footbal leagu (nfl). list document season-by-season record 1960 present day, includ post-season records, leagu award individu player head coaches. end 2015 season, team complet 56 season (play nearli 900 combin regular season playoff games), conclud 2015 season 24–10 victori carolina panther super bowl 50 santa clara, california. bronco franchis found august 14, 1959, bob howsam play first season 1960, denver, colorado part origin american footbal leagu (afl). team join nfl 1970 result afl–nfl merger.[1] franchis experienc two major period success. first 1976 1981, bronco lose season (a season team loss wins), two afc west divis titles, one afc championship. second began 1983 end 1998. period, bronco two lose seasons, afc champion five time super bowl champion two consecut years. second period success best rememb john elway team' quarterback.[2] bronco also experienc one notabl period deterioration. inaugur season 1960 1975, make either afl playoff nfl playoff two win seasons. bronco charter afl franchis never win season afl' ten year exist (although team finish 7-7 1962), first win season occur 1973, fourth year member nfl' afc. also experienc two season fewest win ever, win two 14 game 1963 1964.[3] bronco afc west champion 15 times, recent divis last five consecut season (2011 present), also earn wild card berth playoff seven times, total 22 playoff appearances. confer champion eight time (ti pittsburgh steeler new england patriot afc championships) super bowl champion thrice.[3] seasons[edit] note: finish, wins, losses, tie column list regular season result exclud post-season play. super bowl champion (1970–present) confer champion divis champion wild card berth offici nfl record februari 7, 2016 season team leagu confer divis regular season post-season result award head coach finish win loss tie 1960 1960 afl west 4th 4 9 1 frank filchock 1961 1961 afl west 3rd 3 11 0 frank filchock 1962 1962 afl west 2nd 7 7 0 jack faulkner (coy) jack faulkner 1963 1963 afl west 4th 2 11 1 jack faulkner 1964 1964 afl west 4th 2 11 1 jack faulkner (0–4) mac speedi (2–7–1) 1965 1965 afl west 4th 4 10 0 mac speedi 1966 1966 afl west 4th 4 10 0 mac speedi (0–2) ray malavasi (4–8) 1967 1967 afl west 4th 3 11 0 lou saban 1968 1968 afl west 4th 5 9 0 lou saban 1969 1969 afl west 4th 5 8 1 lou saban 1970[a] 1970 nfl afc west 4th 5 8 1 lou saban 1971 1971 nfl afc west 4th 4 9 1 lou saban (2–6–1) jerri smith (2–3) 1972 1972 nfl afc west 3rd 5 9 0 john ralston 1973 1973 nfl afc west 3rd 7 5 2 john ralston 1974 1974 nfl afc west 2nd 7 6 1 john ralston 1975 1975 nfl afc west 2nd 6 8 0 john ralston 1976 1976 nfl afc west 2nd 9 5 0 john ralston 1977 1977 nfl afc west 1st 12 2 0 division playoff (steelers) 34–21 confer championship (raiders) 20–17 lost super bowl xii (cowboys) 10–27 craig morton (cbpoy) red miller 1978 1978 nfl afc west 1st 10 6 0 lost division playoff (steelers) 10–33 randi gradishar (dpoy) red miller 1979 1979 nfl afc west 2nd 10 6 0 lost wild card playoff (oilers) 7–13 red miller 1980 1980 nfl afc west 4th 8 8 0 red miller 1981 1981 nfl afc west 2nd 10 6 0 dan reev 1982[b] 1982 nfl afc 12th 2 7 0 dan reev 1983 1983 nfl afc west 3rd 9 7 0 lost wild card playoff (seahawks) 7–31 dan reev 1984 1984 nfl afc west 1st 13 3 0 lost division playoff (steelers) 17–24 dan reev 1985 1985 nfl afc west 2nd 11 5 0 dan reev 1986 1986 nfl afc west 1st 11 5 0 division playoff (patriots) 22–17 confer championship (browns) 23–20 (ot)[c] lost super bowl xxi (giants) 20–39 dan reev 1987[d] 1987 nfl afc west 1st 10 4 1 division playoff (oilers) 34–10 confer championship (browns) 38–33[e] lost super bowl xxii (redskins) 10–42 john elway (mvp) dan reev 1988 1988 nfl afc west 2nd 8 8 0 dan reev 1989 1989 nfl afc west 1st 11 5 0 division playoff (steelers) 24–23 confer championship (browns) 37–21 lost super bowl xxiv (49ers) 10–55 dan reev 1990 1990 nfl afc west 5th 5 11 0 dan reev 1991 1991 nfl afc west 1st 12 4 0 division playoff (oilers) 26–24 lost confer championship (bills) 7–10 mike croel (droy) dan reev 1992 1992 nfl afc west 3rd 8 8 0 dan reev 1993 1993 nfl afc west 3rd 9 7 0 lost wild card playoff (raiders) 24–42 wade phillip 1994 1994 nfl afc west 4th 7 9 0 wade phillip 1995 1995 nfl afc west 3rd 8 8 0 mike shanahan 1996 1996 nfl afc west 1st 13 3 0 lost division playoff (jaguars) 27–30 terrel davi (opoy) mike shanahan 1997 1997 nfl afc west 2nd 12 4 0 wild card playoff (jaguars) 42–17 division playoff (chiefs) 14–10 confer championship (steelers) 24–21 super bowl xxxii (1) (packers) 31–24 nfl afc west 2nd 10 6 0 lost wild card playoff (colts) 24–49 mike shanahan 2005 2005 nfl afc west 1st 13 3 0 division playoff (patriots) 27–13 lost confer championship (steelers) 17–34 mike shanahan 2006 2006 nfl afc west 3rd 9 7 0 mike shanahan 2007 2007 nfl afc west 2nd 7 9 0 mike shanahan 2008 2008 nfl afc west 2nd 8 8 0 mike shanahan 2009 2009 nfl afc west 2nd 8 8 0 josh mcdaniel 2010 2010 nfl afc west 4th 4 12 0 josh mcdaniel (3–9) eric studesvil (1–3) 2011 2011 nfl afc west 1st 8 8 0 wild card playoff (steelers) 29–23 (ot) lost division playoff (patriots) 10–45 von miller (droy) john fox 2012 2012 nfl afc west 1st 13 3 0 lost division playoff (ravens) 35–38 (2ot) peyton man (cbpoy) john fox 2013 2013 nfl afc west 1st 13 3 0 division playoff (chargers) 24–17 confer championship (patriots) 26–16 lost super bowl xlviii (seahawks) 8–43 peyton man (mvp, opoy) john fox 2014 2014 nfl afc west 1st 12 4 0 lost division playoff (colts) 13–24 john fox 2015 2015 nfl afc west 1st 12 4 0 division playoff (steelers) 23–16 confer championship (patriots) 20–18 super bowl 50 (3) (panthers) 24–10 von miller (sb mvp) gari kubiak total 456 386 10 (1960–2015, includ regular season) 23 19 -- (1960–2015, includ playoffs) 479 405 10 (1960–2015, regular season 1960–2015, playoffs; 3 nfl championships) footnotes[edit] ^ result afl-nfl merger, leagu broken two conferences, afl team move american footbal conference.[4] ^ due 1982 strike-shorten season, leagu broken two confer instead normal division alignment.[5] ^ game includ drive, quarterback john elway led bronco 98-yard drive tie game less minut left.[6] ^ strike 1987 reduc regular season schedul sixteen fifteen games.[5] ^ game includ fumble, cleveland browns' run back earnest byner fumbl broncos' 3-yard line, enabl bronco
